PropertyList.title: Tu-134LK
PropertyList.text:
Wellcome to version 3.1 of Tupolev-134-LK for Cosmonaut Training
Based on Tu-134A model: Empty: 63934 lbs Zero Fuel: ? lbs Max Fuel load: 30867 lbs Max Payload: 18075 lbs Max Take-Off: 94798 lbs Max Land: 94798 lbs Cruise: IAS 458 @ 35000
New in version 2.1: runway effect, softer elevator handling, taxi and landing lights for rembrandt
- Many systems as in the AN-12BK, AN-22A or Tu-160-Blackjack, refer to them for more help
Update Version 3.1:
Zero-G-Parabelflugtechnik implemented: Steps in seconds 3 - 22 - 46 - 68 - 80
- Set IAS to 360, ALT to 19000 and HDG direktly into the wind, its easy done with the wind instrument. - When in stable flight IAS off and full throttle. - Then press the ZGP Button. - A counter will start, full throttle till counter is at 25. - Reduce Throttle to 0 and enjoy the zero Gravity from counter 30-50, 20 seconds zero gravity. - Only controll of throttle is needed, the pitch will be automatically bring you back to 19000-20000 ft. - Automatic pitch control till Counter is at 80. - automatic ALT to 19000 and back to 380 ktn, then start again by pressing the ZGP-button.
Lots of changes in the FDM, Instruments and Animations, stairs, chokes, warning signs, lamp, switch. If chokes are set you get stairs when opening the door.
Have fun and get the latest version at: https://github.com/HerbyW?tab=repositories
